Posts.Content: Hi wonkey donkey, Welcome to the Online Community. I'm sorry to hear about your cancer but I'm glad you found us here.  I noticed you wanted to meet others locally - you might find our In Your Area tool really helpful for this. I'm afraid we don't allow members to disclose their personal details on the Online Community for privacy reasons - I hope you can understand.  I hope you find this useful but please don’t hesitate to get back in contact if you have any more questions about this or need some more help. Kind regards, Tracey Macmillan Community Team
